mapper.select: select o.order_id from orders o,member m,order_detail od where o.member_id=m.member_id and m.member_id=#{member_id} and od.order_id=o.order_id and (od.status is null or od.status='R' or od.status='C') group by o.order_id order by o.order_id desc

select i.image,i.item_name,od.amount,i.item_id, od.detail_id, o.order_id,i.price, od.status,to_char(o.order_date,'yyyymmddhh24mi') order_date from item i, order_detail od, orders o where od.order_id=o.order_id and od.item_id=i.item_id and i.delete_flag='N' and o.order_id=#{order_id} and (od.status is null or od.status='R' or od.status='C')

select i.image,i.item_name,od.amount,i.item_id, od.detail_id, o.order_id,i.price, od.status,to_char(o.order_date,'yyyymmddhh24mi') order_date from item i, order_detail od, orders o where od.order_id=o.order_id and od.item_id=i.item_id and i.delete_flag='N' and o.order_id=#{order_id} and od.status is null
mapper.update: update order_detail set status='R' ,refund_reason=#{reason} where detail_id=#{detail_id}
